Paragraph: When PQCDTB and PC71BM were fabricated in a 1 : 1 weight ratio , the open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) , short - circuit current ( J SC ) , fill factor ( FF ) , and power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) were 0.79 V , 5.6 mA cm^-2 , 55.8% and 2.5% , respectively.

Paragraph: When PQCDTB and PC71BM were fabricated in a 1 : 1 weight ratio , the open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) , short - circuit current ( J SC ) , fill factor ( FF ) , and power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) were 0.79 V , 5.6 mA cm^-2 , 55.8% and 2.5% , respectively.

| --- |
| open-circuit voltage (V OC) |
| short-circuit current (J SC) |
| fill factor (FF) |
| power conversion efficiency (PCE) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

| --- |
| open-circuit voltage (Voc) |
| short-circuit current density (Jsc) |
| fill factor (FF) |
| power conversion efficiency (PCE) |

Note: I assumed "current" in the original paragraph referred to current density, as it was paired with "cm^-2" in the unit.
